original: Birath, Sven Erland Axel, läroverksadjunkt, Linköping, f. 17/4/90 i Asker, Örebro 1., av kyrkoh. B. E. B. o. Nanna Qvarnström. G. 25 m. Hildur Eriksson. Barn: Ingrid f. 29, Margareta 32. — Mog:ex. v. Karol. lärov. i Örebro 08, fil. mag. i Upps. 13, prov-år v. norra latin i Sthlm 17. Stud:-res. t. Tyskl. 20 o. (m. statsstip.) 3-1, Frankr. 21, Tyskl. o. Österr. 22, Tyskl. o. Schweiz 23. Lär. v. Örebro 1. folkhögsk. i Kävesta 14-16, vik. lär. i Hedemora 15 o. 16, bitr. lär. v. Dalarnas folkhögsk. i Fornby 15, 16 o. 17, e. lär. i Eskilstuna 18-23, adj. v. Hudiksvalls h. a. 1. 22-27, v. Karol. lärov. i Örebro 27-39, adj. i m<od’ersm. o. tyska v. Linköp. h. a. 1. sed. 39, rektors iskrivbitr. i Eskifetuna 19-23, i Örebro 31-39, i Linköp. sed. 39. RVO.
translated: Birath, Sven Erland Axel, high school teacher, Linköping, born April 17, 1890 in Asker, Örebro County, son of the reverend B.E.B. and Nanna Qvarnström. Married Hildur Eriksson in 1925. Children: Ingrid (born in 1929), Margareta (born in 1932). Birath graduated from Karolinska high school in Örebro in 1908, received a Bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1913 and worked as a substitute teacher at Norra latin in Stockholm in 1917. He went on study trips to Germany in 1920 and 1923 and to France in 1921. He taught at Örebro 1st folk high school in Kävesta from 1914-1916, was a substitute teacher in Hedemora in 1915 and 1916, assistant teacher at Dalarnas folk high school in Fornby in 1915, 1916, and 1917, and a permanent teacher in Eskilstuna from 1918-1923. He was an adjunct teacher at Hudiksvall high school from 1922-1927, a teacher at Karolinska high school in Örebro from 1927-1939, and has been a German and Swedish teacher at Linköping high school since 1939. He also worked as a registrar's clerk at Eskilstuna from 1919-1923, in Örebro from 1931-1939, and in Linköping from 1939. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in Sweden.

education.educationalCredentialAwarded: Mog:ex. v. Karol. lärov. i Örebro
